title: eye steak with a parsnip and potato rosti, wild mushroom sauce and parsnip crisps
description: An indulgent treat of juicy rib-eye steaks with a creamy mushroom sauce and a crisp potato rosti.
ingredients: 1 parsnip, grated (if using large parsnips remove the woody core)
salt and freshly ground black pepper
2 tbsp fresh chervil leaves, for garnish
1 large parsnip, sliced into strips using a vegetable peeler
